professional.introText: At Covenant Group, we connect talented people with top employers, matching your skills and aspirations with opportunities to grow and succeed. Whether you're looking for a new challenge or the next step in your career, we're here to guide you toward lasting success.
professional.card1Desc: Build a lasting career with stable opportunities and long-term professional growth.

card1Benefits.title: Stability:
card1Benefits.text: Secure long-term professionals who grow with your company.

card1Benefits.title: Culture Fit:
card1Benefits.text: Hire individuals aligned with your organization's values and vision.

card1Benefits.title: Retention:
card1Benefits.text: Build loyalty and reduce turnover through permanent placements.

professional.card2Desc: Flexibility and growth through project-based roles across diverse industries.

card2Benefits.title: Flexibility:
card2Benefits.text: Scale your workforce quickly to meet project or seasonal demands.

card2Benefits.title: On-Demand Talent:
card2Benefits.text: Access specialized expertise without the long-term obligation.

card2Benefits.title: Cost Control:
card2Benefits.text: Pay only for the duration and skills you need.

industrial.introText: At Covenant Group, we connect talented people with top employers, matching your skills and aspirations with opportunities to grow and succeed.
industrial.card1Desc: Gain experience, prove your value, and grow into permanent opportunities.

card1Benefits.text: Evaluate performance and fit before making a long-term hire.
Reduce hiring risks and training costs with pre-screened talent.
Seamless transition from temporary to permanent employment.

industrial.card2Desc: Work on your terms. Seasonal jobs offer flexibility and experience.

card2Benefits.text: Quickly fill roles during peak demand or staff shortages.
Maintain productivity with qualified, safety-trained workers.
Flexible contracts that adapt to your business cycles.
